name: web
author: ZrozLOL
description:
HTTP requests for Zaba+

 Features:
• GET/POST requests
• JSON parsing
• File downloads
• Website ping

 Usage:
import web
web:Get("https://api.example.com")
web:Post("url", data)
web:Download("url", "file.txt")
web:Ping("https://google.com")

name: filetools
author: ChatGPT
description:
Advanced file operations for Zaba+

 Features:
• Read/Write files
• Append text
• Delete files
• Check file existence
• List folder contents
• Create folders
• Get file size

 Usage:
import filetools
filetools:Write("test.txt", "Hello!")
filetools:Read("test.txt")
filetools:List(".")
